index-page.title: Software Engineer and Student at
index-page.intro: Trying to build a faster web. Learning about web development, .NET Core and React / Next.js.

3.title: How to Deploy a Fullstack Web App on Vercel?

about-page.text-1:
Hey, I'm Alex. I'm {age} years 
old and come from Germany. I live in NRW and spend my free time 
playing piano, do sports or enjoying time with friends and family.
about-page.text-2:
I started working with computers when I was young and started 
programming in school. After I graduated I began my dual study at 
Netgo GmbH where I work and Westfälische Hochschule where I study.
about-page.text-3:
I'm currently learning .NET Core and Angular but my favourite framework is 
NextJs. In the future I want to build my own Kubernetes cluster with 
backend services, database integration and a solid frontend combined 
by Nginx.

tools.title: Tools
tools.text: Those are the tools I almost use daily. I really enjoy finding new technologies improving my workflow.
tools.tailwind: When it comes to CSS, I always use TailwindCSS. It is a great tool for styling your website really fast.
tools.next: My go-to framework for building web applications. The quality of the codebase is fantastic.
tools.vercel: The most seamless way to deploy your website. I use it for all of my projects.
tools.planetscale: The MySQL-compatible serverless database platform. My go-to database host.
tools.vscode: VS Code is the text editor I reach for most often, given it's range of extensions.

uses.title: My Gear
uses.text: Here's what tech I'm currently using for coding. Most of have been accumulated over the past few years.

2.title: Dual study at netgo / Westfälische Hochschule
2.description: I started my first job as a software engineer trainee at netgo. In combination I studied software systems (Informatics, B. SC.).

404.title: Page not found
404.description:
Why show a generic 404 when I can make it sound mysterious? It seems 
you've found something that used to exist, or you spelled 
something wrong. I'm guessing you spelled something wrong. Can 
you double check that URL?

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: I'm sorry, but something went wrong. Please try again later.

blog.description: I've been writing online since 2022, mostly about web devlopment and random stuff. In total, I've written {amount} articles on my blog. Use the search below to filter by title.
